column4: vlet: I've got no problem reading manuals. I'm just trying to decide if it's feasible to make the Linux jump for us.
one more question.  Has anybody had success with using Wubi in Vista?
vlet: I just need to be able to really lock down these machines. Students can be pretty destructive.  Things like not changing the desktop background, editing start menus, that kind of thing.
Thats pretty easy with linux, you can give them very very basic permissions
